definition: one bedroom and one living room
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: Hi, I want to rent an apartment with one bedroom and one living room in the NTU area.
sentences.chinese: 你好，我想在台大附近租间一房一厅的房子。

sentences.english: I'd like to rent either a studio or a one-bedroom apartment.
sentences.chinese: 我想租一间小套房或是一房一厅的公寓。

sentences.english: I want to rent a flatlet or an apartment with a chamber and a hall.
sentences.chinese: 我想租一间小套房或是一房一厅的公寓。

sentences.english: My place is a one-bedroom apartment in Brooklyn.
sentences.chinese: 我的家是一间在布鲁克林的一房一厅公寓。

definition: configuration of rooms in a residence (e.g. 3BR 2 Bath)
to rent jointly with other people/co-renting
hotel room with one double (or queen or king) bed
(of a landlord) to rent out one or more parts of a property/(of a tenant) to sublet one or more parts of a property/(agriculture) sharecropping
abbr. for 標準間|标准间[biao1 zhun3 jian1], standard (hotel) room
